nodes.text: Plasma torches were tools used to cut through solid objects with a flow of plasma, they could be used as weapons. They are known to have been used in the Peragus Mining Facility; when Meetra Surik was trapped inside the facility's medical bay, she used a plasma torch to cut the way out through a closed door.
Plasma torches were also used by Tien Tubb on Nar Shaddaa.

Plasma torches are notable in the game Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic II: The Sith Lords for being one of the most useful tools in the game, being able to bash almost any locked door or container open.
